title: Bug 3970 [preferences] UI needed to define the default line delimiters for new files (1GFIOAX)
description: Bug 3970 [preferences] UI needed to define the default line delimiters for new files (1GFIOAX) the Windows work stations are used as X terminals and to run Eclipse (since PC are cheaper than Unix boxes).
OB: When creating a new file, the line delimiter currently used is the one returned from System.getProperties("line.delimiter"). However, this may not always be what the user wants.
EB: The user should be able to define the default line delimiters for new files through the UI in the preferences.
SR: To reproduce the issue, consider the following scenario: Use a Unix and a Windows workstation to develop a Unix product/program. Open Eclipse on the Windows workstation and create a new file. Observe that the line delimiter used is the one returned from System.getProperties("line.delimiter").
